meanings.sent1: I found a fiver in my pocket and used it to buy some candy.
meanings.sent2: He handed the cashier a fiver to pay for his coffee.
meanings.sent3: The fiver in my wallet was feeling lonely among the singles.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up when she saw the fiver tucked in the birthday card.
meanings.sent5: The crumpled fiver had been through many hands before landing in mine.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is five years old.
meanings.sent1: The little fiver proudly showed off his new toy to his friends.
meanings.sent2: The family dog, a fiver, loved to play fetch in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fiver decided to paint the cat's tail with watercolors.
meanings.sent4: The fiver's birthday party was filled with laughter and cake.
meanings.sent5: The fiver's parents were amazed at how fast he was growing up.

meanings.sent1: Runners gathered at the starting line for the annual fiver in the park.
meanings.sent2: She trained hard to compete in the upcoming fiver with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise challenged the hare to a friendly fiver around the pond.
meanings.sent4: The fiver through the forest was grueling but exhilarating for the participants.
meanings.sent5: The winner of the fiver received a shiny medal and a round of applause.
